body_html: Based on your nvidia-smi, the line "0 2847 C python 10937MiB" indicates you already have a TensorFlow process running that is using all the memory (perhaps in an interactive Python shell). Try killing that process and trying again.
body_text: Based on your nvidia-smi, the line "0 2847 C python 10937MiB" indicates you already have a TensorFlow process running that is using all the memory (perhaps in an interactive Python shell). Try killing that process and trying again.
body: Based on your nvidia-smi, the line "`0 2847 C python 10937MiB`" indicates you already have a TensorFlow process running that is using all the memory (perhaps in an interactive Python shell). Try killing that process and trying again.
